CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Destination Info stage positioned above or below the Travel to Destination stage?
SRP.A: The View Destination Info stage is positioned {above} the Travel to Destination stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Destination Info?
VE.A: The value of stage View Destination Info is {2919}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Flight?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Flight is {895}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Destination Info, with a value of {2919}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Check-in at Hotel, with a value of {383}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation?
SC.A: Decreased by {805} Thousand Tourists from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight?
SC.A: Decreased by {481} Thousand Tourists from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation?
SC.A: Decreased by {1} Thousand Tourists from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1778? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Destination Info} stage has {2919}, the {Search Travel Packages} stage has {2181}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 676? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Travel to Destination} stage has {458}, the {Check-in at Hotel} stage has {383}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 676 and 1135? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Flight} stage has {895}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {894}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, or from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Travel Packages} to {Select Accommodation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages, from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to stage {Search Travel Packages} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation, from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Search Travel Packages} to stage {Select Accommodation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Search Travel Packages} and {Select Accommodation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Flight} and {Make Reservation} stages.
